info.title: Bill's Pro API
info.description: API documentation for Bill's Pro - Crypto and Bill Payment System

post.description: Register a new user

message.example: Registration successful. Please verify your email.

post.summary: Verify email OTP and create wallets
post.description: Verifies the OTP sent to user's email. Upon successful verification, automatically creates fiat wallet (NGN for Nigeria) and crypto virtual accounts for all supported currencies.

200.description: Email verified successfully and wallets created

post.summary: Resend OTP to email or phone
post.description: Resend OTP to email or phone
Set 4-digit PIN for transactions

message.example: Your transaction pin has been set successfully

get.summary: Check if user has set up transaction PIN
get.description: Check if user has set up transaction PIN

post.description: Verify transaction PIN

400.description: Invalid PIN or PIN not set

post.description: Send a 5-digit OTP to the user's registered email address for password reset.

message.example: Password reset OTP sent to your email

post.description: Verify the 5-digit OTP sent to user's email for password reset.

message.example: OTP verified successfully. You can now reset your password.

post.description: Reset user password with verified OTP. Requires email, OTP, new password, and password confirmation.

message.example: Password reset successfully. You can now login with your new password.

get.description: Get all available bill payment categories.
Get providers for a specific category.
Get available plans/bundles for a provider (Data and Cable TV only).

post.description: Validate electricity meter number before payment.
Validate betting account number before payment.
Preview bill payment with fee calculation before confirming.
Create a pending transaction and return payment summary. Does NOT deduct balance yet.
Complete the payment by confirming the pending transaction. Deducts balance and requires PIN.

get.description: Get user's saved beneficiaries.

post.description: Save a beneficiary for future use.

get.description: Get the user's active chat session if exists.
Get all chat sessions for the authenticated user.

post.description: Start a new chat session with support.

get.description: Get a specific chat session with messages.
Get all messages for a chat session.

post.description: Send a message in a chat session.

message.example: Can you help me with this issue?

post.description: Mark all messages in a chat session as read.
Close a chat session.

get.description: Get all available blockchains for USDT.
Get all virtual accounts for the user. USDT accounts are grouped together.
Get detailed information about a specific crypto account.
Get deposit address for receiving crypto.
Get exchange rate for buying or selling crypto.

post.description: Preview buy crypto transaction with fees and exchange rate.
Confirm and execute buy crypto transaction.
Preview sell crypto transaction with fees and exchange rate.
Confirm and execute sell crypto transaction.
Send crypto to an external address.

get.description: Get user dashboard data including balances, recent transactions, and quick stats.
Get bank account details for making deposits.

post.description: Initiate a deposit request and get bank account details for payment.
Confirm that payment has been made and credit the user's wallet.

message.example: Deposit confirmed and wallet credited successfully

400.description: Deposit not found or already processed

get.description: Get user's deposit history.
Get deposit details by reference number.
Retrieve the current KYC information and status for the authenticated user.

post.description: Submit Know Your Customer (KYC) information including personal details, BVN, and NIN numbers.

get.description: Get support contact options and social media links.
Get all support tickets for the authenticated user.

post.description: Create a new support ticket.

description.example: I am unable to complete my crypto deposit

get.description: Get a specific support ticket by ID.

post.description: Close a support ticket.

get.description: Get user's transaction history with optional filters.
Get detailed information about a specific transaction.
Get user's fiat currency transactions (NGN, USD, EUR, etc.) with optional filters.
Get transaction statistics for the authenticated user.
Get all transactions aggregated from all sources (Naira, Crypto, Virtual Card).
Get all bill payment transactions for the authenticated user.
Get all naira withdrawal transactions for the authenticated user.
Get all naira deposit transactions for the authenticated user.
Get all active virtual cards for the authenticated user.

post.description: Create a new virtual card. Requires card creation fee of $3.

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific virtual card including card number, CVV, and expiry.

post.description: Add funds to virtual card from Naira or Crypto wallet.
Withdraw funds from virtual card to Naira wallet.

get.description: Get transaction history for a specific virtual card.
Get billing address for a virtual card.

put.description: Update billing address for a virtual card.

get.description: Get spending and transaction limits for a virtual card.

put.description: Update spending and transaction limits for a virtual card.

post.description: Freeze a virtual card to make it inactive. Requires support to unfreeze.
Unfreeze a virtual card to make it active again.

get.description: Get total wallet balance including fiat (NGN) and crypto balances. Crypto balances are converted to USD using exchange rates from wallet currencies.
Get all fiat wallets for the authenticated user.
Get all crypto virtual accounts for the authenticated user. These are automatically created when the user verifies their email.
Get all active bank accounts for the authenticated user.

post.description: Add a new bank account for the authenticated user.

put.description: Update an existing bank account for the authenticated user.

delete.description: Delete (deactivate) a bank account for the authenticated user.

post.description: Set a bank account as the default account for withdrawals.

get.description: Get the withdrawal fee amount.

post.description: Process a withdrawal to a bank account. Requires PIN verification.

get.description: Get withdrawal transaction history for the authenticated user.
Get details of a specific transaction.
